item.title: FreeBitmapMulti
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

procedure FreeBitmapMulti(Bmp: array of Integer);
var i: Integer;
begin
  for i:= 0 to GetarrayLength(Bmp)-1 do
  begin
    if (Bmp[i] > 0) then FreeBitmap(Bmp[i]);
  end;
end;

Free as many as you want 

FreeBitmapMulti([Must, Not, Use, Condoms, As, Cups]);

Read full topic

item.title: FreeBitmapMulti
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

I made this when I was using FindObjectDeformed. I didnt want to keep adding free bitmaps so I thought id make this. I know its nothing big, probably something that wont be used, and I dont even know if it would work, but hey, its the first time making a Fuction.

[scar]
// By Junior
// Will free up to five bitmapsâ€¦ I think.
Function FreeBitmapMulti(Bitmap1,Bitmap2,Bitmap3,Bitmap4,Bitmap5:integer): Boolean;
Begin
If (Bitmap1 > 0) Then
Begin
Result:= True
FreeBitmap(Bitmap1);
End;
If (Bitmap2 > 0) Then
Begin
Result:= True
FreeBitmap(Bitmap2);
End;
If (Bitmap3 > 0) Then
Begin
Result:= True
FreeBitmap(Bitmap3);
End;
If (Bitmap4 > 0) Then
Begin
Result:= True
FreeBitmap(Bitmap4);
End;
If (Bitmap5 > 0) Then
Begin
Result:= True
FreeBitmap(Bitmap5);
End;
End;
[/scar]
